ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act
PrecisINFRASTRUCTURE PROJECTS ENVIRONMENTAL ASSESSMENT ADAPTATION REGULATIONS, providing federal environmental assessment (EA) exemption to low-risk projects and allowing substitution of provincial EAs for certain projects to remove duplicative EA requirements.
